Articles.Content:
So I wanted to set up a base on kerbin to test the mod out, and every time i launch something from the K&K mod, DMP will tell me that the parts are not Whitelisted. I always whitelist the parts whenever I install a new mod using DMP options. Or maybe is there a way to disable the parts whitelist function completely? Why is the K&K mod not working with DMP? Also, to generate whitelist, I just go to options in DMP settings , then go to Mod Control, then I use Generate Whitelist

Edited April 12, 2017 by ajud
